duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network (SCN) construction projects, managing multiple projects simultaneously.
Attend and support Kick-Off meetings, vendor selection and bid process, and customer meetings as the construction subject matter expert.
Manage equipment and material procurement, ordering, and validation during site walks.
Provide direction to general contractors, review As Built drawings, and ensure jobs are maintained in the project tracking system.
Assist Construction Manager with site visits, safety inspections, and construction closeout, and engage with General Contractors on corrective actions.
Develop proficiency in permitting and licensing process, with a focus on public and private right of way, and manage issues impacting project completion or cost.
Observe and learn from Network Construction Managers, Project Managers, Fiber Engineers, NOC, Field Operations, and Customers.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required. Valid driver’s license required.
